chapter.title: Human expressive language is repressive of heavenly realm
chapter.para:
Between 2004-03-22T00:00:00.0000000-08:00 and 2004-03-23T00:00:00.0000000-08:00 I dreamt of a classroom setting. The students in the class including Bimbo and myself were assigned laboratory experiments that included programming tasks. The instructor advised against wasting efforts on creative programming. The template examples accompany the course should guide our endevors.
This will offer the opportunity to prepare on presenting highlights in an interactive acting scenario.

sect1.title: 2004-03-25T00:00:00.0000000-08:00 How do you provide food without the infrastructure to provide education?
sect1.para: Joseph commends Benjamin, God's grace (Genesis 43:29, 34, Genesis 45:6, 11, 22, Genesis 46:32-34, Genesis 47:1-6, 12). Joseph entertains his siblings as guest by offering food and clarifing distortion prior to revealing himself. Joseph subsequently offers clothing and arranges family re-location, reunion, and co-existence. Pharaoh accomodates Jacob's offspring livelihood by availing role and attest the continuity between Ishmael's circumcision and Jacob's refuge, 130 / 13 = 10, 130 / 5 = 26.
